can you burn games from this site with the new imgburn mick084
all the RROD XGD3 0800 games on here wurn fine with new imageburn, i have testes gow3, space marine so far and both worked ok
when you burn the game it will say not enough space on disc. select burn until end of disc. not overburn
when will the new lt2.0 be here anyone know???
yes acid brown lt+2.0 is needed to play this game

yes you still need lt2.0, you can burn all the new games with this version of imageburn but until you update your box to lt2.0 (allready released for phat) and slim drive (coming this weekend) they wont work until you have lt2.0
